name: Crawfish-Stuffed Avocados
description: This recipe calls for crawfish, but you could easily substitute crab meat, shrimp or lobster. The sweetness of the seafood will complement the creaminess of the avocado in this elegant but easy dish.
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste
2 large ripe avocados, halved and pitted

recipeInstructions.text: Place the crawfish, carrot and zucchini in a medium bowl. Add the lime juice, Tabasco sauce, one teaspoon salt and pepper to taste and toss to combine. Sprinkle the avocado halves lightly with salt and divide the crawfish mixture among them. Sprinkle with the cilantro and serve immediately.
